contest-event.event-date:
July 23, 1932 D Sheffield Contest
Sheffield Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
sheffield-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Darnall, Sheffield, Yorkshire Test pieces - Class A - L'Etoile du Nord, Class B - A Summer Day, Class C - Beautiful Britain. Best class B band - 1st Askern, 2nd Barrow Colliery, 3rd Markham Main. Best class C band - 1st Killamarsh, 2nd St Margaret's, 3rd Langwith. March contest - 1st Grimesthorpe, 2nd Manvers Main, 3rd Markham Main, 4th Barrow Colliery. Deportment - 1st Markham Main, 2nd Grimethorpe.
Sept. 1, 2013, 3:58 p.m. Dec. 27, 2016, 12:03 p.m.
